txt.en: Someone has broken into the vault of Calembel while the majority of the guard force is absent from the city. A great many valuables were stolen, and reports have come in that the Corsairs who roam the outskirts of Lamedon openly carry the stolen goods on their persons.\n\nA reward will go to any warrior who can recover the treasure that was stolen.
Stolen treasure from the vault of Calembel can be found on Corsairs in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should recover stolen treasures from the Corsairs.
Someone has robbed the vault of Calembel, stealing a great many valuables.
'Well done! You are quite a boon to Calembel.'
Laindir can be found in Calembel in Lamedon.\n\nYou should return to Laindir and collect your reward for recovering the stolen goods.
